scripts.build: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec rspack build --config rspack.config.js --mode production
scripts.build:development: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec rspack build --config rspack.config.js --mode development
scripts.build:production: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec rspack build --config rspack.config.js --mode production
scripts.serve: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec rspack serve --config rspack.config.js --mode production --port 3010 --no-hot
scripts.serve:development: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec rspack serve --config rspack.config.js --mode development --port 3010
scripts.serve:production: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 pnpm exec rspack serve --config rspack.config.js --mode production --port 3010 --no-hot
